history.text: hi
Hi, we're talking about Wold of Wall Street. Have you seen it?
I've heard it, but I have not seen it
It is directed by Martin Scorsese. Do you like his movies?
Oh right, I like Martin's movies ... what do you think about the critics of this movie?
I think that they were a little harsh. It received a score of 78% on Rotten Tomatoes but I think it deserves a high score?
Metacritic gave it 75/100. Do you usually go by critics' judgement?

sometimes ..... 
But nevertheless it is a good score ... And what is cast? that sometimes influences a lot
Leonardo DiCaprio stars as Jordan Belfort. Jonah Hill and Margot Robbie are also in this film.
wow, it's a very elite cast
One of the key scenes is when Belfort makes a small fortune selling penny stocks. This was very unheard of at the time.
The genre is "black comedy" do you like movies is this genre?
ohhh .. And what is the movie mainly about ?? and tell me a little, without so much spoiler hehehej
I like it, it's realistic
It is about Belfort's career as a stockbroker in NYC and how his firm is engaged in rampant corruption and fraud.

One critic said, "epic in size, 
 narrow in scope"
is that this is about that although it can be satire are cases that are easily seen in real life, it sounds very interesting
Yes Jordan finds a business partner and then they start a company with several of his friends and one point they illegally make 22 million dollars in three hours

in 
3 hours ?? this is crazy ... what else happens?
This gets the attention of the FBI so he opens Swiss bank accounts in his wife's aunt's name.
He uses his wife and friend's to smuggle one into Switzerland because they have European passports
what the corrupt always do, open accounts in Switzerland and use their families, it's very sad that, the film seems to be a good reflection of reality

Yes, it is based off of Jordan's Belfort's memoir so a lot of the things depicted
 in the movie happened to him in real life.
and has a good outcome? , normally this kind of movies disappoints a bit the end, I do not know if this is the case
He gets caught by the FBI but serves a reduced sentence and now he makes a living teaching seminars.
Do you think it would be a good sentence if it were a real case?
It was a real case. He was offered a reduced sentence because of his testimony. He ratted out his friends that helped him.
ooooh ok, really that this review that you have given me has attracted my attention
It is a very good movie
what year is it from ?
It is from 2013
thank you very much friend, have a nice day
